content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Coal Mine at Position (41.0, -86.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 41.0, -86.0) and a wooden chest (position 41.5, -82.5)
- Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -86.0) and a wooden chest (position 43.5, -84.5)
- Burner inserter (position 41.5, -83.5) connecting the transport belt to the wooden chest

#### Iron Ore Mine at Position (-17.0, -52.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -17.0, -52.0) and a wooden chest (position -16.5, -50.5)
- Burner inserter (position -17.5, -50.5) connecting the mining drill to the wooden chest

#### Smelting Setup at Position (-15.0, -51.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -15.0, -51.0) and a wooden chest (position -13.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace (position -13.0, -50.0) and a wooden chest (position -13.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (position -14.5, -52.5) connecting the furnace to the wooden chest
- Burner inserter (position -11.5, -50.5) connecting the furnace to the wooden chest

### ERROR TIPS

#### Errors when extracting items from an empty chest
- Ensure the chest contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting to extract it. Check the inventory of the chest to confirm the item is present.

#### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Ensure the tile is free before placing an entity. Check the map to confirm the tile is not already occupied by another entity.

#### Errors when using inserters with no source items
- Ensure the inserter has access to the items it needs to pick up. Check the source entity's inventory and position to confirm the items are available.

#### Errors when mining drills are out of fuel
- Ensure mining drills have sufficient fuel to operate. Check the fuel inventory of the mining drill and add coal or other fuel sources as needed.

#### Errors when chests are full
- Ensure the chest at the drop position of a mining drill or inserter is not full. Empty the chest to allow the mining drill or inserter to continue operating.
